author: Sarah Jones
title: Dear Rich People: Please Stop Hoarding Things
description: Coronavirus is reinforcing social divisions that have existed for a long time.
content: A pandemic demands public acts of solidarity. We alter our lifestyles with the well-being of our neighbors in mind. We stay home as much as we can, we sew masks for health professionals who need them, we set up mutual-aid groups to assist our sick and elderly… [+5692 chars]
